entry.title: 3M 7993MP-24X36 - Membrane Switch Spacer Single Coated Clear 3 Mil 799P 24 in x 36 in (61 cm x 91.4 cm) 7000115630
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Switch Spacers
Price: 732.43

[shortdesc]

3M Membrane Switch Spacer Single Coated, clear, 3 mil, 7993MP, 24 in x 36 in (61 cm x 91.4 cm)

  • 3M™ Membrane Switch Spacer Single Coated 7993MP has a 2-mil (0.05 mm) 200MP high-performance acrylic adhesive on one side of a 1-mil (0.025 mm) polyester film
  • The clear polyester carrier brightens overlays and keypads, eliminating the need for a flood coat, and is easily applied for a smooth, clean graphic appearance.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Switch Spacers

    Product Information

  • High shear strength to withstand repeat stresses of switch actuation
  • Excellent moisture, UV, solvent and temperature resistance
  • Easy to apply without mess
  • Easy to die-cut and process
  • Smooth appearance on graphic overlays

    • Suggested Application

  • Ideal for selective die-cutting, lead protection, dome retainer sheets and printing conductive circuitry
  • Can be used for applications involving appliances, electronics, industrial controls equipment, medical equipment, medical devices, automotive, ATM mac
    		•

[shortdesc]

3M Membrane Switch Spacer, 7957MP, clear, 7 mil, 24 in x 36 in (61 cm x 91 cm)

  • 3M™ Membrane Switch Spacer 7957MP is a 2 mil, 200MP, high-performance acrylic adhesive that is double-coated on each side of a 3 mil polyester film carrier
  • It has a 4.2 mil, 58 pound double liner that is moisture-resistant and constructed on polycoated kraft.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Switch Spacers

    Extra Product Information

  • 3M™ High Performance Acrylic Adhesive 200MP is a popular choice and industry standard, for graphic attachment and general industrial joining applications
  • This adhesive helps provide initial repositionability for placement accuracy when bonding to plastic

  • Provides high shear strength to help accommodate the stress of repeated actuation
